thread.title: Daily Afternoon Randomness in HQ (46 Photos)
thread.title_full: Daily Afternoon Randomness in HQ (46 Photos)

author: John
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness in HQ (46 Photos)
text:
GIF 8 
Thanks to our friends at Chive Nation and Chive Charities , theCHIVE has been named the World’s Kindest Business . 9 
It’s Friday here at theCHIVE and I look out at the Copper Bar I see two bachelorette parties, our Lone Star Chivers (who raised $13,900 for Active Heroes this week alone) retired Marines, police, and admins from chapters across the country. This is a snapshot of life at theCHIVE HQ. And I really am proud of all this, it’s something special what we’ve done here. We might just be the world’s kindest business. 10
